EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Citi Dev Maven Expo_Q217.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Citi Dev Maven Expo Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Citi Dev Maven Expo in Irving, TX on June 27th. We hope you will leave this workshop with a better understanding of digital transformation <[[https://pivotal.io/digital-transformation]]> and what's needed to migrate existing applications and build new ones in a cloud-native way.
Date: Tuesday, June 27, 2017
Time:
12:00PM to 4:00PM
Location: Citigroup 6400 Las Colinas Blvd Irving, TX, 75039 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/6400+Las+Colinas+Blvd,+Irving,+TX+75039/@32.8970025,-96.9516077,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x864c283b6b3a8495:0x772d24a1611e0fa8!8m2!3d32.8970025!4d-96.949419]]>)
You may find the following links helpful prior to the Expo:
- A Guide to Modern Java <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-dzone-guide-to-modern-java]]> - PCF Dev - Spring Cloud Services in you Pocket <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/pcf-dev-spring-cloud-services-in-your-pocket]]> - Pivotal Gemfire <[[https://content.pivotal.io/datasheets/pivotal-gemfire]]> - Microservices in a Legacy World <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/bootiful-microservices-in-a-legacy-environment-lessons-learned]]> - CI/CD with Concourse <[[https://concourse.ci/]]> - Accelerating Transformation at Citi <[[https://pivotal.io/imapivot/citi]]>
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>. We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Citi-Dev-Maven-Expo.html]]>
